00043 typedef struct _Grid {
00044 
00045    /* dimension (2 or 3) */
00046    int      num_dims;
00047 
00048    /* lower and upper geometric limits in each coordinate direction */
00049    /* for the interior of the computational domain (user specified) */
00050    LSMLIB_REAL   x_lo[3];
00051    LSMLIB_REAL   x_hi[3];
00052 
00053    /* lower and upper geometric limits in each coordinate direction */
00054    /* for the entire computational grid INCLUDING the ghostcells    */
00055    LSMLIB_REAL   x_lo_ghostbox[3]; 
00056    LSMLIB_REAL   x_hi_ghostbox[3];
00057 
00058    /* number of grid points in each coordinate direction for the */
00059    /* interior of the comptuational domain (user specified)      */ 
00060    int      grid_dims[3];
00061 
00062    /* number of grid points in each coordinate direction for the */
00063    /* entire computational domain INCLUDING the ghostcells       */
00064    int      grid_dims_ghostbox[3];
00065 
00066    /* grid spacing in each coordinate direction */
00067    LSMLIB_REAL   dx[3];
00068 
00069    /* total number of gridpoints */  
00070    int      num_gridpts;
00071    
00072    /* index space for ghostbox of field variables                     */
00073   /* NOTE: the ghostbox is assumed to be the same for all variables. */
00074   int ilo_gb, ihi_gb, jlo_gb, jhi_gb, klo_gb, khi_gb;
00075   
00076   /* index space for interior of grid (i.e. fillbox) */
00077   int ilo_fb, ihi_fb, jlo_fb, jhi_fb, klo_fb, khi_fb;
00078  
00079   /* index spaces for fillbox of undivided differenced */
00080   /* (used in calculation of spatial derivatives)      */
00081   int ilo_D1_fb, ihi_D1_fb, jlo_D1_fb, jhi_D1_fb, klo_D1_fb, khi_D1_fb;
00082   int ilo_D2_fb, ihi_D2_fb, jlo_D2_fb, jhi_D2_fb, klo_D2_fb, khi_D2_fb;
00083   int ilo_D3_fb, ihi_D3_fb, jlo_D3_fb, jhi_D3_fb, klo_D3_fb, khi_D3_fb;
00084   
00085   /* number of narrow band levels if local method is used */
00086   int  num_nb_levels;
00087   
00088   /* marks used for boundary layers in local method */
00089   unsigned char mark_gb, mark_D1, mark_D2, mark_D3, mark_fb;
00090   
00091   /* inner and outer narrow band widths (local method) */
00092   LSMLIB_REAL beta, gamma;
00093   
00094   
00095 } Grid;
